parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn, making it challenging to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the power steering assist fault light comes on
the steering wheel is hard to turn in either direction
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering wheel makes a noise when turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPAS system can cause the power steering to malfunction, leading to difficulty steering the vehicle, which can increase the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault light comes on
the steering wheel is hard to turn in either direction
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the EPAS power steering rack is faulty and needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the inside door handle can cause difficulties in opening the door, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The door handle hangs limply on its hinges
does not engage the door latch
and requires the window to be rolled down and the outside door handle to be pulled up to open the door.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in recall repairs can lead to continued exposure to safety risks and potential accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The recall part is unavailable
the dealer is unable to provide a timeframe for the repair
and the manufacturer exceeds a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hydraulic lift supports can cause the trunk lid to suddenly fall, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The hydraulic lift supports suddenly fail when lifting the trunk lid
and the parts are unavailable for replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the FCIM can cause the defroster to malfunction, blowing hot air at 90 degrees, and the radio and other electrical systems to fail, leading to a safety issue and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: Defroster malfunctioning
blowing hot air at 90 degrees
radio and other electrical systems failing
loss of dashboard controls
and inability to shut off the blower.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the loss of all dashboard controls, including the radio, heat, and AC, leading to a safety issue and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: Loss of all dashboard controls
including the radio
heat
and AC
failure of the defroster
and inability to shut off the blower.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Adaptive Cruise Control and Collision Avoidance System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the adaptive cruise control and collision avoidance system can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to a safety issue and potential accidents.
symptoms: Faulty adaptive cruise control
collision avoidance system failure
and steering inputs without driver input.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the keyless start/stop button can cause the engine to shut off inadvertently, leading to a safety issue and potential accidents.
symptoms: Inadvertent engine shut-off
loss of power steering
and loss of turn signals.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning headlights can cause reduced visibility, making it difficult to see pedestrians, animals, or other obstacles on the road, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The headlights are not bright enough
there is a sharp cutoff or horizontal line across the windshield
the lights are dim or do not illuminate properly
the lights have a "finger shadow" effect
the lights are hypnotic
and the visibility is poor
especially in rainy or dark conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the BLIS system can cause false warnings or failure to detect vehicles in the blind spot, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The BLIS system gives false warnings
the system does not detect vehicles in the blind spot
the system only detects vehicles at close range
and the system does not work as described in the official Ford documentation.
